title: Should Bert Correct His Tip? + Our Intern Had No Idea Who This Celeb Was Until It Was Too Late!
description:
Our intern Mackenzie recently blew it after meeting a celebrity at her job. She had no idea who he was until it was too late. But before we hear that story, we need to hear from Bert. He thought he was leaving a great tip for some servers over the weekend, but now, he's questioning it.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
